No.254213)} Sub: Appraisal of the Projects Modifications in the Constitution of (i) Project Appraisal and Technical Scrutiny Committees (PATSC) and (ii) Internal Appraisal Committees (IAC) reg: In F.Y. 2024-25, the Appraisal/ Sanction of Projects are either to be obtained through SFC / MoRTH or PPPAC or PIB/ CCEA and pre-appraisal has to be carried out within NHAI before sending such proposals to MoRTH: Accordingly, the Project Appraisal & Technical Scrutiny Committees (PATSC) and Internal Appraisal Committee (IAC) have been reconstituted as under, in supersession of earlier Policy Circular No.3.6.16/2024 dated 05.07.2024: Constitution of Committee Jurisdiction Project Appraisal and Technical Scrutiny Committees (PATSC) Committee-1 The Projects in the States of 1 Sh.
